data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Aimeliik, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aimeliik, Palau
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Aimeliik, Palau.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 66 believers in the state of Aimeliik into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Aimeliik, Palau to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Ngchemiangel
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Ngchemiangel, Aimeliik, Palau.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 66 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Aimeliik that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 66 believers living in Aimeliik, Palau.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.
